html:
2.3.21  11:27 pm   feelings on being regular?

      it only counts if you win 1st place, most regular

2.3.21  10:22 pm   do you write songs about your dreams?

      i try to let the dreams write the songs

2.3.21  10:21 pm   May I presume most of your lyrics are stream-of-consciousness and that you don't actually sit down and deliberate about them deeply?

     i deliberate a lot, but it's usually about the lyrics and music simultaneously. those 2 are so important to each other that everything tends to fail when they are not working together

     Because that's what I presume, and I love it, and it reminds me that I can just make music without being so anal about it all "making sense" somehow. Just make it.

      there is a lot of deliberation, to make the music as meaningful as possible. i deliberate desperately until it makes so much sense that it penetrates my soul

2.3.21  9:54 pm   is your shift button broken because you never do caps?

      it would seem that that would be a reason for them to be preserved in perfect condition, not broken

2.3.21  9:44 pm   why did you spell neighbour/neighbor two different ways in here comes the sun

      keep my options open

2.3.21  9:25 pm   will you ever make lullaby

      yes

2.3.21  8:06 pm   What's your favorite piece of music that you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.3.21  7:57 pm   before august 2020, did "here comes the sun" have a different ending? or was it just an incomplete song?

      it had the 2013 ending

2.3.21  6:14 pm   do you like call backs to your previous songs or do you try to avoid those

      avoid

2.3.21  5:52 pm   Whats your opinion on crabs?

      not very realistic

2.3.21  5:24 pm   How do you think of the lines in your songs?

      i try to think of something, and that usually doesn't work. but if line thinks of me and then i'm all set

2.3.21  4:44 pm   What color do you associate with California?

      gold

2.3.21  4:22 pm   How do you come up with those lyrics...

     which ones

     like.. how does your brain function?

     the whole trick is to think about apples and oranges at the same time. then the brain explodes and you can start your day from there

2.3.21  3:55 pm   what information is stored on the information shelf at 1:56? (in here comes the sun)

      book_number, location_x, location_y, location_z, rotation_x, rotation_x, rotation_y, height, width, depth, color_r, color_g, color_b

2.3.21  3:58 pm   Will your next song contain any knowledge regarding velcro?

      no

2.3.21  3:16 pm   why did u not make any songs in 2012? there's no 2012 songs listed on your songs page

      i was writing furiously

2.3.21  3:09 am   how do i be cool

      have dinner on top of the restaurant, instead of inside

2.3.21  3:04 pm   Do you have any advice for how to write lyrics?

     do it with music

     More poetic writing is way more difficult to get a handle on than prosaic or academic writing, for me at least. 

      write any way you know how. although sometimes it's fun to write in a way you don't know how. more surprises that way

2.3.21  3:00 pm   writing the melody and chords on my instrument is all good and well, but how do you do basslines?

     start by just playing the root of the chords any time a new chord happens. then gradually try to solve all the problems that makes you feel

     should there be drums first?

      maybe

2.3.21  2:54 pm   What is the answer to the universe

      could be you

2.3.21  2:24 pm   when you say good morning to someone at 6am and then unexpectedly go to sleep again until 4pm, do you still greet them with good morning

      always greet everyone with good morning

2.3.21  1:50 pm   What do you think of haikus?

      i like them except for the middle line, which i think is too long

2.3.21  1:20 pm   what is the plot of breaking bad

      a bunch of people team up and try to break bad

2.3.21  12:54 pm   which song/video that u made are you the proudest of?

      hopefully the next one

2.3.21  11:24 am   Will you make a video next tuesday?

     what complicates that strategy is that it takes more than 1 day to make a video

     Or would you rather have a new tuesday to be your favorite?

     i would rather release at least 1 video every week. preferably 3

2.3.21  10:51 am   will you use the 6th note in the dorian in your next song

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.3.21  9:38 am   was might quit a hint that you would quit your journey to greenland?

      no

2.3.21  9:34 am   how to motivate myself

      what exactly do you want

2.3.21  8:49 am   what is La de da de da de da de day oh about because the lyrics seem a bit vague?

      music, good and bad times, joy, self expression, and understanding

2.3.21  7:02 am   will you ever do a collab with bill wurtz

      that sounds like a nightmare

2.3.21  6:39 am   how do i do things

      imagine 2 opposite things

2.3.21  5:53 am   what was the bad thing you did?

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

2.3.21  4:32 am   what is your next song about ?

      wistfulness, listlessness, wishfulness,

2.3.21  3:21 am   How do you achieve self-confidence?

      have you tried saving the universe

2.3.21  2:08 am   Is every song that you work on considered your favorite song of yours until the second you release it?

      it's my job to try to do anything within my power to make it my favorite

2.3.21  1:30 am   which day of the week are you focusing on?

      wednesday

2.3.21  12:18 am   is life meaningless?

      no

2.2.21  11:11 pm   what's your opinion on blobfish?

      the ultimate bedtime companion

2.2.21  10:21 pm   have you ever skipped over recording/making a video for a song because the song was "too good" and you didn't want to ruin it for yourself by listening to it over and over again for weeks on end?

      no, but i've skipped them because they are too good and i'm afraid i can't produce it good enough

2.2.21  9:22 pm   Will the new video be with the new animation style?

      i am merging my latest techniques with some later techniques as well as with some footage from when i was in purgatory a while back

2.2.21  9:12 pm   do you believe that everyone is interesting?

      yes

2.2.21  9:03 pm   how to get over fear of unfulfilled potential

      you'll wanna go ahead and start fulfilling some of that potential

2.2.21  7:47 pm   it would be a nice twisty treat if you covered a song

      i've been wanting to do that for a long time. i'm sure i will do it soon

2.2.21  6:41 pm   Can you explain a subtle change?

      sure

2.2.21  6:32 pm   What do I do when I have so many ideas and not nearly enough time or energy to make something out of all of them and they're really hard to combine to have less ideas and I keep getting more and I can't let go of any of them but it's also hard to make them into things? Would flow charts help?

     sure

      If so, where can I make flow charts?

     in your office

2.2.21  6:12 pm   when did you start writing here comes the sun

      i think august 3, 2010

2.2.21  5:54 pm   is shakespearan a vibe

      yes

2.2.21  5:52 pm   do you think you will remaster your old songs/videos with your new animation style which is 3d? i just wanna see what "and the day goes on" would look like in full 3d

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

2.2.21  5:18 pm   what are your opinions on giraffes?

      they are surprisingly wide

2.2.21  5:04 pm   i feel like my writing is sounding really fake deep right now, do you have any tips to make it feel more real?

      try writing some trash. trash is one of the realest things out there
